channel.title: Lukasz Izmajlowicz
channel.description: Trying to survive in IT world

item.title: Automate Creation Of Jekyll Blog Post Files
item.description: Welcome to re-launch of my blog. I hope this time I will do better job and find motivation and enough time to create new content more frequently. For new launch I decided to try out Jekyll. Why? Mostly because of its simplicyty. The way Jekyll is handling post creation is...
